title: Modal API - ModalProvider - ModalProvider Context
content:
<PropName
  name="currentModal"
  type="string"
  isContextProp
/>
The slug of the currently open modal. Modals compare their slug with this value to determine their open status. If the page was loaded with a ?modal=x URL parameter, this value will be used even if no matches are found.
<PropName
  name="oneIsOpen"
  type="boolean"
  isContextProp
/>
True when currentModal has value. The <ModalContainer> will undergo transition every time this changes.
<PropName
  name="open"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Sets currentModal to the given slug. Will either add modal to the URL parameters or fire the given callback function based on handleParamChange.
<PropName
  name="toggle"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Takes the slug of any modal and opens or closes that modal based on its current status, using the open and close methods.
<PropName
  name="closeAll"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Resets currentModal and oneIsOpen. Will either remove modal from the URL parameters or fire the given callback function based on handleParamChange. Unlocks all body scroll locks.
<PropName
  name="closeOnBlur"
  type="boolean"
  id="closeOnBlur-context"
  isContextProp
/>
Enables a click event on the <ModalContainer> that, when clicked, will close all modals.
<PropName
  name="setCloseOnBlur"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Used internally to set the global closeOnBlur status. Fired each time a modal is opened based on its own closeOnBlur prop.
<PropName
  name="bodyScrollIsLocked"
  type="boolean"
  isContextProp
/>
The current state of body scroll lock, useful when multiple modals differ in lockBodyScroll.
<PropName
  name="setBodyScrollLock"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Enables and disables scroll on the HTML body using body-scroll-lock. Fired by lockBodyScroll on each modal individually. Check bodyScrollIsLocked for the global status after overrides.
<PropName
  name="containerRef"
  type="object"
  isContextProp
/>
A reference to <ModalContainer>, where each modal portals into.
<PropName
  name="setContainerRef"
  type="method"
  isContextProp
/>
Used by <ModalContainer> to populate containerRef on mount.
<BasicContext href="#modalprovider-props" />
</JumplistNode>
<JumplistNode nodeID="container">
